name: Entre-Deux
detailed_description:
My name is Elrica Elsa. Five years ago, our world, Medocorilia, has fallen prey to the undead. It's hard for me to survive, especially since I'm pregnant, but now I am in the Community, a village of Entre-Deux (sentient zombies), and I have 10 hours to "prove my worth"... or die!

Features

''Entre-Deux'' is an interactive story written with Twine. The number of words is around 6 200. The original language is in French.
Multiple endings!
It has several endings. Can you find them all?
Customize!
It is possible to personalize your reading experience with the choice of 3 text sizes, 2 background colors and 3 fonts.
Easy language switch.
It is easy to switch from one language to another in the Settings menu.
Easy Steam Achievements!

short_description: A short interactive story made with Twine. A world invaded by zombies, a pregnant woman... and a village of Entre-Deux.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above (x64 ONLY)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
